text: Dündar, Alpin en büyük vasfı tevazudur
english: Dündar, Alpin's greatest quality is humility

text: Bu da görüyorum ki sizde var çok şükür
english: And I see you have it. Thank God.
Modesty, honesty, hospitality, generosity
Alp must not act as a monopoly
He shouldn't hold his heart high
Black Polet must steal his own sword
He must kill his property without pity
No Alps for a man who's fond of wealth.

text: Alp dediğin, sofra çekmeyi atadan görmeli
english: The Alps have to see the table from the ancestor.
Kazuluk must ride a horse

text: Çalık kesen öz kılıcı er çalmalıdır
english: The self-stealing sword must be stolen by the private
Erin should come to her tent.
The private must not know a lie.

text: Baş kesip, kan dökmek Alp olmak için yetmez
english: Cut off the head and shed blood isn't enough to be the Alps

text: Hüner ve erdem Alp'i Alp yapan en mühim şeydir aslında
english: Skills and virtues are the most important thing that makes the Alps the Alps.
And, of course, the sword.

text: Alpin en az kendisi kadar erdemli maharetli bir kılıcı olmalıdır
english: Alpin must have a sword as virtuous as himself.
I'm making these swords for you.

text: Tıpkı Süleyman Şah Gündoğdu ve Ertuğrul’a yaptığım gibi
english: Just like I did with Solomon Shah Gündüz and Ertuğrul.

text: Süleyman Şahlar nereye gitti Deli Demir?
english: Where did Solomon Shahs go, Mad Iron?

text: Yıllardır peşimizden gelen Moğollardan artık kaçacak yer kalmadı Yiğit
english: There's no more escape from the Mongols who have been after us for years, hero.

text: Büyük bir ittifak kurup artık bu belaya dur demenin vakti geldi
english: It's time to form a big alliance and stop this trouble.
Either we win, we live...
...or we're going to die. There's no difference.
Is that why they left?
Yes, son.
May God help them.
Amen.

text: Şurada biraz istirahat etsek mi beyim?
english: Why don't we get some rest over there, sir?
You make me sound like an old man.
No way, Dad.

text: Sen hepimizi tespih gibi dizersin evelallah
english: You'll get us all a rosary, God willing.
We sang for the horses.
Sir

text: Biz önden karşıya geçip etrafı bir kolaçan edelim
english: We'll go across the front and have a look around.
Hurry up.
Thank you, Lord.
He'll stop and listen to the beauty you've made...

text: …onları görüp, içine sindirecek bir yürek verdiğin için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for giving them a heart to see and digest.
He's been on your path for a long time.

text: …aslanlar gibi evlatlar yetiştirdiğim için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for raising children like the lions.

text: Evlatlarımın analarıyla şu bülbülün sesi gibi…
english: Like that nightingale with the mothers of my children.

text: …kısa ve güzel bir ömür verdiğin için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for giving us a short life and a good life.
Dad!
Dad!
Dad!
Dad!
Our Oba is in your care.
Like your wives and your children.
...and keep our room safe from all evil.
To the custom of our father, Oğuz.
...the state of this ceremony, Seljuklu, obey.
One and be alive.

Glory be to Allah, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most High, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great.

text: ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlü
english: And his mother, Muhammaden abduhu and his prophet.
Sir!
Stop!
Sir!
Sir!
May your place be in heaven, my lord.

text: Niyet ettim Allah rızası için namaza
english: I intended to pray, for God's sake.
Praying for peace
As a private person.
Allahu Akbar
Allahu Akbar
Allahu Akbar

As-salaam-alaikum and rah-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la

As-salaam-alaikum and rah-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
How did you know about the deceased?
We knew it well.
Do you approve of your rights?
Way to go.
Are you doing it?
Way to go.
Are you doing it?
Way to go.
The brave sons of Kaiyeh...

text: …geceyi güne, günü güneşe çeviren rabbim şahit olsun ki…
english: ...who turned night into day, day into sun, so that the Lord may bear witness...
It's not a fairy tale.
I'll tell you what I'm going to tell you. From the mountains of Wuthering to Anatolia.
...from Anadolu to hundreds of conquests and conquerors...
...the true story of the holy road and of the journey.

text: Bu hikâye onlarca beyin içinde beyimizi
english: It's a story about our gentleman in a dozen brains.
Solomon is the story that makes the king
He's the king of Solomon.

text: …tevazudan, yiğitlikten, mertlikten ve Allah’ın adaletinden asla geçmemiş…
english: ...subjected in humility, courage, courage, and the justice of God.

text: …bir arada olmanın, bir olmanın var olmak olduğunu bilen ecdadımızdan bugüne…
english: ...to be together, to be together, to be alive, to this day...

text: …ve bugünden yarınlara anlatılacak Türklük tarihinin baş tacıydı
english: ...and the crown of Turkish history to be told from today to tomorrow.
From Oğuz Khan to today...
...from this day to many sultans...

text: …nice fatihlere uzanacak şanlı tarihimizin muzaffer bir beyiydi
english: ...a victorious gentleman of our glorious history to reach the victors.

text: Dünün tarihi yarının tarihine ersin diye ona emanet edildi
english: He was entrusted with yesterday's date for tomorrow's date.

text: O, bu emaneti canı pahasına korudu
english: He protected this relic with his life.
Open up his room, he didn't open it.
God's justice did not fail.
He knows all about your Lord and the tradition.

text: Cenk etti Ne nefsine ne cenkte düşmana yenildi
english: He was defeated neither in battle nor in the flesh.
What traitors from the nearest...

text: …ne de diğer zorluklar onu yolundan çevirebildi
english: ...and no other challenges could keep him out of his way.

text: Ne zalimin zulmü ne kâfirin gücü onun önüne geçebildi
english: Neither the tyranny of the oppressor nor the power of the infidel could overcome it.
Ayi was entrusted to him by his sons.

text: O emaneti Allah’ın izniyle siz fetihler yapın…
english: By the will of God, you must conquer that trust...

text: …yapın ki ne zalim ne zulüm kalsın diye bugüne değin…
english: ...do it so that there will be no cruelty, no cruelty, until today...

text: …bey gibi, şah gibi Süleyman Şah gibi taşıdı
english: Like a man, as a king, he carried like a king.
Now you have that trust.
It's a debt. lt's a sin on our necks.
May God please him.

text: Sizin de yolunuzu fetihlere daim kılsın inşallah
english: May he lead your way to conquest.
Remember, my children, you are his generation.
Never forget, you're his generation!
My king has come to fly
My father...
Where's Dad?
Where's my dad?
You have to be strong.
That's what my father would have wanted.
Let go.

text: Bırak da en yakın dostunun acısını yaşasın Aykız’ım
english: Let him suffer the pain of his best friend, Aygirl.
Is it true?
Ertuğrul
My father died in peace.
Wouldn't have it any other way.
May his place be in heaven.
May God give you a long life.
Before he died...
...he wanted us to go to Anadolu.

text: Zor ve çileli bir hayat yeniden başlıyor Halime
english: A hard and painful life is beginning again, Halima.

text: Olsun. Senin olduğun her yer benim yuvam zaten
english: Well, wherever you are, it's my home.

text: Obamın olduğu her yer de yurdum
english: Where my Obama is, my homeland is.
May God make you feel better.

text: Allah’ın izniyle oğlumuz olursa adını Süleyman koyalım
english: God willing, if we have a son, let us name him Solomon.
To the blessed memory of that blessed man
Sir...
Your father tells me you died in peace.
You're right, Crazy Iron.
He died in peace.

text: Allah’ın ve sevdiklerinin adı ağzında huzur içinde
english: The name of God and his loved ones rests in peace in his mouth
Where's our migration, sir?

text: Alparslan’ın açtığı yoldan gideceğiz Deli Demir
english: We'll go the way that Alparslan opened the Crazy Iron

text: Kış gelmeden babanın mezarına uğrayıp Fatiha okuruz değil mi?
english: We'll stop by your father's grave before winter comes and read Fatiha, won't we?
Here you go.
What happens when you say...
...that fills our hearts with faith...
...in the name of God the Most High, in the name of ninety-nine.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
Gentlemen, my braves...
...welcome to the elders of my office.
You've brought pleasure.
We're welcome.
We're welcome.

text: Beyimiz Süleyman Şah’ımız ölmeden önce vekâletini bana vermişti
english: Our Lord Solomon gave me his power of attorney before his death.

text: Şimdi Süleyman Şah'sız obamızın geleceğini belirleyeceğiz
english: Now we will determine the future of our Oba without Solomon Shah.

text: Süleyman Şah’ımın beyliğin vekâletini size vermesi içimize su serpmiştir Hayme Ana
english: It is a relief to hear that Solomon Shah has given you the power of authority, Mother Hayme.

text: Yoksa şimdi bir de beylik meselesiyle uğraşıp belaya kalırdık
english: Otherwise, we'd be in trouble now with the company business.
Thank you, Crazy Iron.
Thanks.
Our last consultation with the Oğuz gentlemen...
...It has been said that Mongols have harassed Anatolia.

text: Küçük Moğol birlikleri, Anadolu topraklarında akınlara başlamıştır
english: Little Mongol troops have begun their raids on Anatolian territory

text: Artık bu zalimler sürüsüne dur demenin vakti gelmiştir
english: It's time to tell these evildoers to stop.

text: Bir Kayı’ya bin Moğol düşerken elimizden ne gelir Hayme Ana?
english: What can we do, Mother Hayme, when a thousand Mongols fall on a Kaiyah?
It's not just us Apricots...

text: …bütün Oğuz boyları bu ittifakın son çare olduğunu bilir
english: ...all Oğuz clans know that this alliance is a last resort.

text: O yüzden bütün Oğuz boyları Anadolu’da toplanacaktır
english: So all the Oğuz families will be gathered in Anatolia
If we don't become one...
...if we don't go through with it...
...if we grow the seeds of hypocrisy between us...

text: …çakal Moğol sürüsünün önünde yem oluruz, yem!
english: ...we'll be bait in front of the Mongol pack, bait!

text: Ben yine de temkinli olmakta fayda var derim
english: I still say it's good to be cautious.

text: Bilirsiniz, Halep’e bin bir zorluk ve çileyle geldik
english: You know, we came to Aleppo with a lot of difficulty and suffering.

text: Tapınakçılardan kurtulmuşken şimdi yeniden yola revan olmak niye?
english: Why go back on the road now that you've gotten rid of the Templars?
Son
Our King Solomon

text: bu ittifakın gerçekleşmesi için çok çaba harcamıştır
english: He's put a lot of effort into making this alliance happen.

text: Bir yanda Haçlılar, bir yanda Moğollar…
english: On one side the Crusaders, on the other the Mongols...

text: …yeni bir cihanın, arsız, acımasız kanlı bir düzeni kurulmaktadır
english: ...a new jihad, a shameless, ruthless, bloody order is being established.

text: Bu düzende ya kuyruğunu kıstıran itlerle…
english: In this order, either with the Mutts with their tail between their legs...

text: …ya da dimdik duran Alplerle birlikte olmamız lazım
english: Or we should be with the Alps standing upright.
I say...
In this mortal world, let's face it.

text: Soyumuzdan tek bir kişi kalacağını bilsek bile bu zalimlerle cenk edelim
english: Let's fight these tyrants even if we know there's only one of our descendants left.
And I say...
It's time to take revenge on the Mongols.
They killed our children, our mothers, our sisters.
If we don't stand up to them...
...this world can't find peace.
You're right, Crazy Iron.

text: Şimdi geldiğimiz Anadolu topraklarına dönmeye ne dersiniz beylerim?
english: How would you gentlemen like to return to the land of Anatolia, where we are now?
I'm not for the road.

text: Lakin toydan böyle bir karar çıkmıştır
english: But that's the kind of decision you make when you're young.
It's up to me to follow.
Let's get shot.
It's time for our caravan to be on the road.

text: Vakit, Moğol eşkıyasına dur deme vaktidir
english: It's time to tell the Mongol bandit to stop.
May God help us all.
Amen!

text: Kayılar Anadolu’nun dirilişi için yol aldılar
english: The apricots are on their way to the resurrection of Anatolia.

text: Ve onlar yol aldıkça tarih değişecekti
english: And as they moved on, history would change.
As they move on, the persecution will end...
Justice would come.
